code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{dashboardAPI}from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Dashboard(){const[dashboardInformationData,setDashboardInformationData]=useState(null);const[isLoadingState,setIsLoadingState]=useState(true);const[errorMessageState,setErrorMessageState]=useState(null);console.log('Dashboard component is rendering...');console.log('Current loading state:',isLoadingState);useEffect(()=>{console.log('Dashboard useEffect is running...');fetchDashboardInformationData();},[]);const fetchDashboardInformationData=async()=>{try{console.log('Starting to fetch dashboard data...');setIsLoadingState(true);const apiResponse=await dashboardAPI.getOverview();console.log('API response received:',apiResponse);setDashboardInformationData(apiResponse.data);setErrorMessageState(null);console.log('Dashboard data set successfully');}catch(errorObject){console.error('Error in dashboard:',errorObject);setErrorMessageState('Failed to load dashboard data');alert('Sorry! There was an error loading the dashboard. Please try again.');}finally{setIsLoadingState(false);console.log('Loading finished');}};const formatCurrencyAmount=amount=>{if(amount===null||amount===undefined){return'0.00';}return amount.toFixed(2);};if(isLoadingState){console.log('Showing loading state...');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Loading dashboard..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Please wait while we get your data..."})]});}if(errorMessageState){console.log('Showing error state...');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"alert alert-error",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Oops! Something went wrong"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:errorMessageState}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",onClick:fetchDashboardInformationData,children:"Try Again"})]});}if(!dashboardInformationData){console.log('No data available...');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"No data available"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"There seems to be no data to display."})]});}console.log('Rendering dashboard with data:',dashboardInformationData);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"grid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stats-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stats-number",children:dashboardInformationData.totalProducts}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Total Products"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stats-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stats-number",children:dashboardInformationData.totalSuppliers}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Total Suppliers"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stats-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stats-number",children:dashboardInformationData.totalInventoryValue}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Total Inventory Value"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stats-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stats-number",children:dashboardInformationData.lowStockProducts}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Products Running Low"})]})]})]});}export default Dashboard;
